# Postmortem (atom)

## Document Cross-References

**Dependencies:**
- Parent postmortem document (POST-*) or incident report
- Incident data and monitoring/logging systems
- release-checklist-atom (failed release may trigger postmortem)

**Impacts:**
- Generates TODO items for corrective actions
- May update risk-item-template with new identified risks
- Informs future DoD/DoR criteria improvements
- Updates runbooks and operational procedures

**Related:**
- risk-item-template (realized risks become postmortem subjects)
- release-checklist-atom (release failures trigger postmortems)
- Other postmortem-atom instances (pattern analysis)

**Satellites:**
- TODO-template (action items from lessons learned)
- Evidence-template (incident logs, metrics, screenshots)
- risk-item-template (new risks identified in postmortem)
